1689.accept_chat_bubble: No use getting sentimental about our old spaceship. It's gone.

1690.chat_state_1: We gotta get that ship wreckage, and fast.

1691.chat_state_1: Amazing that Vanda's agents could identify the Koi wreckage at all!
1691.chat_state_2: We may break it down for bricks, but aside from that, it's useless.
1691.chat_state_3_turnin: So, did he seem happy or blah? Tell me blah.
1691.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.
1691.in_progress: Return to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.
1691.offer: As I said before, the sample we received is in such poor shape that I can't see what Hael would want with it.
1691.ready_to_complete: So it is from the Koi! And he ain't found the rest o' the Imagimeter? What's that, you say? Later, matey. Later.

1692.accept_chat_bubble: The Venture Koi was red, white and beautiful. She won't look like that no more.
1692.chat_state_1: Time to set yer bearings for Crux Prime, me hearty!
1692.chat_state_2: Help Duke on Crux Prime, but keep an eye out for any wreckage from the Venture Koi!
1692.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.
1692.in_progress: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.
1692.offer: Duke says he needs more o' me crew, but I need explorers looking for wreckage from the Venture Koi. Tell Duke you'll volunteer.
1692.ready_to_complete: Hael sent you to join the fight? Excellent!

1693.accept_chat_bubble: All Property Scanner signals must emanate at full strength, or they won't be picked up here at the Tower.
1693.chat_state_1: This dorsal inverse retro-encabulator is still losing 50% of its signal. Hmm.
1693.chat_state_2: Axon Klaxon is the cranky robot in the Assembly Storeroom. He should still have the Dish 6x6 inverted in stock.
1693.chat_state_3: Did Axon dish out the right brick? Oh my, that's clever.
1693.completion_succeed_tip: Return the dish to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.
1693.in_progress: Dr. Overbuild needs a Dish 6x6 Inverted from Axon Klaxon in the Assembly Storeroom in Nexus Tower.
1693.offer: My Property Scanning Device is almost complete, but I need a Dish 6x6 Inverted brick. Axon Klaxon sells one in the Assembly Storeroom upstairs.
1693.ready_to_complete: Perfect! I'll use this brick to mirror the dorsal inverse retro-encabulator and then the Property Scanner will be complete!

1718.accept_chat_bubble: You take those tablets straight over to Nexus Naomi, see?
1718.chat_state_1: Naomi got the hiccups, huh? You tried scarin' her?
1718.chat_state_2: Alright, if you ain't buyin' anything else, then scram!
1718.completion_succeed_tip: Return to the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room.
1718.in_progress: Take the hiccup tablets back to the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room.
1718.offer: I owe Naomi a favor, see? So these tablets are on the house. Give my regards to that digital dame.
1718.ready_to_complete: Perfect. The hiccup tablets have created a nice fizzy froth. Next we need to find a cleanser.

1719.accept_chat_bubble: No tellin' what we'll find once the Imagimeter is back and whole again!
1719.chat_state_1: We used this device to find Planet Crux in the first place. Cor, that was a crazy day!
1719.chat_state_2: Wait 'til the others see this thing back and runnin' again! Doc Overeasy's gonna scramble his circuits!
1719.chat_state_3: Looks right splendid in here, I'd say. Really adds to the ambiance.
1719.completion_succeed_tip: Tell Hael Storm you completed the Imagimeter Base.
1719.in_progress: Quick Build the broken Imagimeter Base by Hael Storm.
1719.offer: Alright, matey. Time to rebuild the Imagimeter Base. Been ages since I seen it whole!
1719.ready_to_complete: A little worse for wear, but still workin'! Now we just need them 3 Imagimeter Shards. They're out there somewhere!

1722.completion_succeed_tip: You've been awarded the Nexus Tower's Founder reward!
1722.description: Subscribe to LEGO Universe during the Nexus Tower launch.

1727.accept_chat_bubble: Bob will tell you how to escape the ship!
1727.chat_state_1: The Maelstrom is tearing the ship apart!
1727.chat_state_2: Head over to the ship's command platform and talk to Bob.
1727.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Bob on the center platform of the spaceship.
1727.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Bob</font> on the center platform of the spaceship.
1727.offer: Youre awake. Lets get you moving! The Maelstrom attacked the ship. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Bob</font> and hell help you escape.
1727.ready_to_complete: We've got to get you off this ship! First you'll need to unlock your <font color='#FF7F00'>Imagination</font>!

1728.accept_chat_bubble: I can't wait to try on my new Ninjago gear!
1728.chat_state_1: Aw no, how am I gonna learn Spinjitzu now?
1728.chat_state_2: I hope Cole isn't mad at me. Well, better him than Kai!
1728.chat_state_3: Did you find it? Wanna see me do some Spinjitzu?
1728.chat_state_4: Spinjitzu makes me dizzy, but I'm getting used to it.
1728.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Ninjago in a Box back to Rocco Sirocco in Avant Gardens.
1728.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Interact with a mailbox</font> to retrieve the Ninjago item from Cole, then give it back to <font color='#FF7F00'>Rocco Sirocco</font>.
1728.offer: There was a mix-up at the post office and my <font color='#FF7F00'>Ninjago package</font> from Cole was sent to you by mistake! Could you get it from your <font color='#FF7F00'>mailbox</font> for me?
1728.ready_to_complete: Find Sensei Wu and you can learn Spinjitzu too. Watch this!

1730.chat_state_3: Ready to turn in the mission

1732.accept_chat_bubble: Build a rocket and then blast off before this whole place falls apart!
1732.chat_state_1: I knew we needed more lifepods!
1732.chat_state_2: What are you still doing here? Launch your rocket and get down to Avant Gardens!
1732.chat_state_3: Look for Wisp Lee by the landing pad on Avant Gardens!
1732.chat_state_3_turnin: Are you from the Venture Explorer?
1732.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Build a rocket</font> at the building area below, then use one of the <font color='#FF7F00'>launchers</font> to escape. <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Wisp Lee</font> when you land.
1732.offer: You'll need to <font color='#FF7F00'>build a rocket</font> to escape the ship! <font color='#FF7F00'>Talk to Wisp Lee</font> when you land on Avant Gardens!
1732.ready_to_complete: You're brave to have escaped the Maelstrom, but I'm afraid things aren't much better down here!

1780.accept_chat_bubble: Fly to Ninjago from Nexus Tower!
1780.chat_state_2: Fly to Ninjago from Nexus Tower!
1780.completion_succeed_tip: Fly to Ninjago from Nexus Tower, then speak to Toshiro Gojira, the Battlefield Guard.
1780.in_progress: Fly to Ninjago from Nexus Tower, then speak to Toshiro Gojira, the Battlefield Guard.
1780.offer: The world of Ninjago needs your help!! Fly there from Nexus Tower and report to Guard Toshiro Gojira on the Battlefield!
1780.ready_to_complete: Are you from the Nexus Force? Good, we could use some help with all of these Skeletons!

1781.accept_chat_bubble: Head across the bridge and look for the side entrances to the Monastery.
1781.chat_state_1: It's a good thing this Monastery was built to withstand Skeleton attacks!
1781.chat_state_2: Hurry inside! You're not much use out here right now!
1781.chat_state_3_turnin: Here's a new face! Tell me, do you know Spinjitzu?
1781.chat_state_4: Come back later and you can help me sort out this mess!
1781.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to Sensei Wu inside the Ninjago Monastery.
1781.in_progress: Use one of the side gates to get inside the Monastery. Then speak to Sensei Wu.
1781.offer: You don't want to be out here with all these boneheads! Hurry and see Sensei Wu inside the Monastery!
1781.ready_to_complete: Ah, welcome. As you can see, we have a bit of a Skeleton problem outside!

1782.accept_chat_bubble: Equip your Imagination Staff and then charge and unleash a Spinjitzu attack!
1782.chat_state_1: Only Spinjitzu can smash the Skeletons, so practice hard!
1782.chat_state_2: You cannot learn Earth, Ice, Lightning or Fire Spinjitzu until you have mastered this first!
1782.in_progress: Hold the attack button to charge your Spinjitzu - then release the button to unleash a Spinjitzu attack in front of Sensei Wu!
1782.offer: Only Spinjitzu can defeat the Skeletons! Equip the Imagination Staff and try to attack me with a Spinjitzu attack!
1782.ready_to_complete: Your form is good, but your lessons have just begun! There are 4 more types of Spinjitzu for you to learn!

1783.accept_chat_bubble: Smash Skeleton Troopers or Blacksmiths to recover their Maelstrom Daggers!
1783.chat_state_1: When I saw the Skeletons mining on Crux Prime, I feared it would one day come to this.
1783.chat_state_2: Be careful! Those dark weapons are not meant for Minifigures!
1783.chat_state_3: Bring them here. I can sense their dark power already.
1783.chat_state_4: Return here later. I still have much to show you.
1783.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Daggers to Sensei Wu inside the Ninjago Monastery.
1783.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Troopers and Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve 5 Maelstrom Daggers.
1783.offer: The Skeletons used Maelstrom Crystals from Crux Prime to forge fearsome weapons and armor! Bring me 5 of their Maelstrom Daggers!
1783.ready_to_complete: We Ninjas are not used to facing this evil Maelstrom - but you are from the Nexus Force, are you not?

1785.accept_chat_bubble: The Skeletons are stockpiling their Maelstrom weapons in gray metal crates!
1785.chat_state_1: My inspiration will be the Skeletons' desperation!
1785.chat_state_2: Those Skeletons will not be happy when you smash their weapon stashes!
1785.chat_state_3: A Dragon that breathed fire? Sounds wonderful!
1785.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Zane in the Monastery Dojo of Ice.
1785.in_progress: Smash 5 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield, then Quick Build them into surprises for the Skeletons.
1785.offer: The Dragon Mask has given me an idea! Smash 5 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Battlefield and rebuild each one into a surprise for the Skeletons!
1785.ready_to_complete: I bet you scared the spines out of those Skeletons!

1787.accept_chat_bubble: Look for the Skeleton Marksmen out on the edges of the Battlefield!
1787.chat_state_1: Those Catapults out there are gonna make me hurl!
1787.chat_state_2: I can't go near those Maelstrom weapons, so you've gotta do this one for me!
1787.chat_state_3: Let's invent some trouble for those Skeletons!
1787.completion_succeed_tip: You found all 3 pages of the Bone Bucket Instructions! Take them back to Jay.
1787.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield and retrieve all 3 pages of the Bone Bucket Instructions.
1787.offer: We need to disable the Catapults out there on the Battlefield! Smash Skeleton Marksmen and find all 3 pages of their Instructions!
1787.ready_to_complete: Those Skeletons might look like boneheads, but they sure can build! Luckily, I can build better than all of them!

1788.accept_chat_bubble: Bubu Mumu sells models from his cart in the center courtyard.
1788.chat_state_1: Gonna have to bone up on my engineering for this!
1788.chat_state_2: Just need a few bricks to rework this design.
1788.chat_state_3: Did Bubu give you a hard time? He's not exactly the cuddly sort.
1788.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Monastery Flag Banner Model back to Jay in the Dojo of Lightning.
1788.in_progress: Buy a Monastery Flag Banner Model from Bubu Mumu in the Monastery, then take it back to Jay.
1788.offer: Hmm, I'm missing a few bricks. Go buy me a Monastery Flag Banner Model from Bubu Mumu, will ya?
1788.ready_to_complete: Perfect! I can break this apart and use some of the bricks to mod the Skeletons' Bone Bucket design!

1789.accept_chat_bubble: Just smash the Bone Buckets on the Catapults and rebuild them!
1789.chat_state_1: Ready to try out my new design?
1789.chat_state_2: You can use the Skeleton Catapults now that I've changed the design!
1789.chat_state_3: Hope those Catapults didn't make you hurl!
1789.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Jay in the Monastery Dojo of Lightning.
1789.in_progress: Smash and rebuild the Bone Buckets on 3 Skeleton Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.
1789.offer: Okay, I've modded the Catapults to fling Ninjas instead of boulders! Smash the Bone Bucket on each of the 3 Catapults and then rebuild it!
1789.ready_to_complete: Use those Catapults as a shortcut back to the Monastery anytime youre out there crackin' on Skeletons!

1791.accept_chat_bubble: Smash the Skeletons first, then rebuild their Ladders!
1791.chat_state_1: Theyre trying to climb the walls out there!
1791.chat_state_2: Those Skeletons will try to stop you from building those Bouncers!
1791.chat_state_3: Those Bouncers will get you out of trouble!
1791.chat_state_3_turnin: Those Bouncers will get you out of trouble!
1791.completion_succeed_tip: Now report to Podo Pandaheart, the other Guard outside the Monastery Gates.
1791.in_progress: Smash 5 Skeleton Ladders on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Bouncers.
1791.offer: They're climbing the walls! Smash 5 Skeleton Ladders and rebuild them into Bouncers! Then report to my brother!
1791.ready_to_complete: You can use Skeleton Bouncers as a shortcut back to the bridge or up here on the wall!
